node.title: A Simple and Fast Object Mapper
node.description: .NET Boxed mapper is an object to object mapper that is simpler and faster than Automapper and makes zero allocations of memory, thus making the garbage collector do less work.

node.title: Optimally Configuring Entity Framework Core
node.description: How to optimally configure your Entity Framework Core DbContext for best performance, resiliency and easy debugging for the developer.

node.title: Migrating to Entity Framework Core Seed Data
node.description: How to migrate an existing database to use Entity Framework Core 2.1 Seed Data to insert static data into your tables while using migrations.
